args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Statement: Let f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù be C^2 with Hessian continuous on a convex set U. Then the
second-order Taylor expansion holds uniformly on compact subsets of U.

We formulate this for a finite-dimensional normed real vector space E (so E ‚âÉ ‚Ñù^n).
-/

open Set

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [FiniteDimensional ‚Ñù E]

theorem second_order_taylor_uniform_on_compact {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {U : Set E}
  (hU_convex : Convex ‚Ñù U) (hcont : ContDiffOn ‚Ñù 2 f U) :
  ‚àÄ K, IsCompact K ‚Üí K ‚äÜ U ‚Üí
    ‚àÄ Œµ > 0, ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0, ‚àÄ x ‚àà K, ‚àÄ y ‚àà U, ‚Äñy - x‚Äñ < Œ¥ ‚Üí
      |f y - f x - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x) (y - x) - (1 / 2) * ((fderiv ‚Ñù (fun x => fderiv ‚Ñù f x) x) (y - x) (y - x))|
        ‚â§ Œµ * ‚Äñy - x‚Äñ ^ 2 := by sorry
